price: que apartan a la gente del sendero de Dios, tratan de modificarlo y no creen en la otra vida!
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
